DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine non-inferiority seroconversion compare safety tolerability ChimeriVax™-JE JE-VAX® respective homologous virus strain several wild type strain completion vaccination course .
DOC.brief_title: A Safety Efficacy Study Two Japanese Encephalitis Vaccines ChimeriVaxTM-JE JE-VAX
DOC.criteria: Written inform consent obtain . Aged ≥18 < 49 year . In good general health . Available study duration , include plan followup visit . Females must negative pregnancy test use adequate form contraception Clinically significant abnormality laboratory vital sign assessment . Anaphylaxis serious adverse reaction Administration another vaccine within 30 day study treatment period . Physical examination indicate significant medical condition . Intention travel area prior study visit Day 56 . Seropositive Hepatitis C Virus ( HCV ) Human Immunodeficiency Virus ( HIV ) positive Hepatitis B Surface Antigen . Pregnancy . Excessive alcohol consumption , drug abuse . Involvement another clinical study within 60 day precede screen visit study treatment period .
